title: Magnetic field - half-way between two long wires

content.question: Two long wires are parallel to each other and are <math alttext="2.0 meters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math> apart. Each wire has a current of <math alttext="3.0 amps" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>, but in opposite directions. What is the magnetic field at the midpoint between the wires?
